GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by date created in descending order

GET /api/articles?sort_by.description: serves an array of all articles sorted in descending order by value given in sort_by query. If not sort_by query is given, articles will be sorted by created_at date in descending order by default

GET /api/articles?order.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by created_at date in order value given in order query. If no order query is given, articles will be sorted by created_at date in descending order by default

GET /api/articles?sort_by&order.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by value in sort_by query in the order value given in order query. If no sort_by or order query is given, articles will be sorted by created_at date in descending order by default

GET /api/articles?topic.description: serves a filtered array of articles where the article topic matches the topic query

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the article matching the article_id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object containing the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with the updated article
